commit.message:
[WIP] Switch pager duty api (#12)

* start to use the incidents API"

* switch over to HTTParty and update the saving of the incident record.

* basic idea of getting seconds to last ack and seconds to resolve

* calculate the time durations in seconds for time to first ack and time to resolve.

* log entries almost working

* Finalizing code for review, fixed issues of no incidents returning by adding until, refactored log data enteries to be single source of truth for datetime.

* setting gather time back to 2 months ago

* fixing potential multiple acknowledge issue

* adding a migration script to set boolean for initial gather task. updating README: planning out new rake tasks, re-ording install commands and options, adding TOC, adding description of project. Updating/Modifying Docker items: Cleaner compose files, New Dockefile that covers both environments based on ARGS. Finalizing some changes to the Pagerduty gather tasks including adding a initial seed option to pull a larger history in at the beginning

* fixing readme

* Adding new rake setup tasks, changing travis to use new tasks, cleaning out old uneeded files, updating readme, updating Gemfile.

* fixing travis commands

* updating gems and removing sidekq items for now

* adding more rake commands, building better programatic deploy options

* Fixing quickstart options and dockerfile, working on production installer rake task

* Adding systemd and upstart templates, building better production deployment task

* Fixing rake tasks and the args that get passed, adding a stop command that works for any install sitation, fixing compose erb, adding process file to check for install/init type

* Updating readme, finalizing cfn deploy

* fixing cfn and process helper

* updating systemd file

* fixing systemd template again

* altering systemd

* updating to support secret token being passed as an arg

* adding secret token to cfn

* fixing erb

* adding cron job to run gather task, fixing production deploy task

* fixing env and cfn userdata

* changing how cron task is built, adding logging to task. adding database_url to env file for postgres DBs

* fixing cat to ignore variables, fixing database_url for prod deploys

* fixing erb

* adding email config options

* adding ERD generator, adding erd pdf, updating readme, updating gems

* Adding updated example files and adding info to readme

* Fixing email options, fixing cfn, moving readme items to wiki

* adding license

* fixing arg order

* Fixing spelling mistake in error message, removing database_url to see if needed

* adding option to compose exec options

* adding images

* removing resizing
